Package business

Class CourseDeserialiser

java.lang.Object
business.CourseDeserialiser
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Course>
public class CourseDeserialiser
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Course>
Custom deserialiser for Course objects from JSON format. This class handles the conversion of JSON data into Course objects, managing the parsing of course details and their associated department information.

The class provides functionality for:

  • Reading course data from JSON files
  • Converting JSON elements to Course objects
  • Handling department associations
  • Managing error cases during deserialisation

  • Method Details

    • deserialize

      public Course deserialize​(com.google.gson.JsonElement json, java.lang.reflect.Type typeOfT, com.google.gson.JsonDeserializationContext context) throws com.google.gson.JsonParseException
      Deserialises a JSON element into a Course object. This method processes the JSON data and creates a new Course instance with the extracted information, including course details and department association.
      Specified by:
      deserialize in interface com.google.gson.JsonDeserializer<Course>
      Parameters:
      json - The JsonElement to deserialise
      typeOfT - The type of the object to deserialise into
      context - The deserialisation context
      Returns:
      A newly created Course object with the deserialised data
      Throws:
      com.google.gson.JsonParseException - If there is an error during JSON processing or parsing
